document.full_text: 'beyond therapy,' christopher durang's absurdist comedy about searching for a love connection through the personals, is the season-opener at the westport country playhouse.
document.title: arts | connecticut: putting romance on the therapist's couch
lines_and_colors: 'beyond therapy,' christopher durang's absurdist comedy about searching for a love connection through the personals, is the season-opener at the westport country playhouse.
